panels.description: All mounts matching /dev/*, not including overlay mounts.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine"] =~ /^(tdm-api|db|influxdb)/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /\/dev(\/(xvda|nvme).*)$/)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /fs_(usage|limit)/ )
    |> keep(columns: ["device", "_time", "_value", "machine", "type", "_field"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean)
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["type"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.usage / r.limit * 100.0, _measurement: "FS %" }))
    |> keep(columns: ["device", "_time", "_value", "machine"])

panels.title: Disk Usage on Important Mounts

alert.name: Disk Usage on Important Mounts alert

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "memory_rss")
    |> group(columns: ["machine"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_usage_total")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "machine"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> toFloat()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: r._value / 10000000.0
        })
    )
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "per_process_disk_io_read_bytes")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "_time"])
    |> sum()
    |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "per_process_disk_io_write_bytes")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "_time"])
    |> sum()
    |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "network_io_bytes_sent")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "hostname"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "network_io_bytes_recv")
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "hostname"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Will be empty if GPU is not enabled

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gpu_memory_used")
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "device_index"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: GPU Memory Usage

panels.description: Will be empty if GPU is not enabled

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gpu_utilization")
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "device_index"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: GPU Utilization

panels.description: Will be empty if GPU is not enabled

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /gpu_power_(draw|limit)/)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.gpu_power_draw / r.gpu_power_limit, _measurement: "Power Draw %" }))
    |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "hostname", "device_index"])

panels.title: GPU Power Draw %

panels.description: Sum of voluntary and involuntary context switches

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /per_process_ctx_switches_(in)?voluntary/)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    |> derivative(nonNegative: true)
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "_time"])
    |> sum()
    |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: CPU context switches

targets.query:
from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "per_process_num_threads")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "_time"])
    |> sum()
    |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "per_process_num_fds")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> group(columns: ["hostname", "_time"])
    |> sum()
    |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

started = from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "engine_job_state" and r["state"] == "started" and r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
    |> keep(columns: ["state", "job_type", "_value", "_time"])
    |> group(columns: ["job_type"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
    |> fill(usePrevious: true)

    finished = from(bucket: "snorkel")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "engine_job_state" and r["state"] == "finished" and r["metric_type"] == "gauge")
    |> keep(columns: ["state", "job_type", "_value", "_time"])
    |> group(columns: ["job_type"])
    |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
    |> fill(usePrevious: true)

    join(tables:{started:started, finished:finished}, on:["_start", "_stop", "_time", "job_type"])
    |> group()
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        r with
        _value: int(v: r._value_started - r._value_finished + 0.99)
        }))
    |> group(columns: ["job_type"])
    |> yield()

started = from(bucket: "snorkel")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "request_started")
|> group(columns: ["_time", "hostname"])
|> sum()
|> group(columns: ["hostname"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> fill(usePrevious: true)


finished = from(bucket: "snorkel")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "request_finished")
|> group(columns: ["_time", "hostname"])
|> sum()
|> group(columns: ["hostname"])
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last)
|> fill(usePrevious: true)

join(tables:{started:started, finished:finished}, on:["_time", "hostname"])
|> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        hostname: r.hostname,
        _value: int(v: r._value_started - r._value_finished)
}))

from(bucket: "snorkel")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "request_finished")
|> group(columns: ["_time", "hostname"])
|> sum()
|> group(columns: ["hostname"])
|> derivative(unit: 1m, nonNegative: true)
|> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum)
